data.chText: 充满生机的；生气勃勃的；精力充沛的
充满生机的城市

data.enText: Thailand is at its most vibrant during the New Year celebrations.
data.chText: 在欢度新年期间，泰国举国欢腾。
鲜艳的；醒目的

data.enText: The room was decorated in vibrant reds and yellows.
data.chText: 那房间是由鲜艳的红黄两色装饰的。
响亮的；洪亮的；强劲的
强有力的节奏

data.text: bright ♦ brilliant ♦ fluorescent ♦ luminous ♦ vivid ♦ vibrant

data.enText: All these words describe things that are shining or full of light or colours that are strong and easy to see.
data.chText: 以上各词均形容事物明亮、光线充足、鲜艳夺目。

data.enText: full of light; shining strongly; (of colours) strong and easy to see
data.chText: 指光线充足的、明亮的、色彩鲜明的：
鲜黄色的连衣裙
指明亮的、鲜艳的：

data.enText: The sky was a brilliant blue.
data.chText: 天空一片蔚蓝。

data.enText: producing bright light by using some forms of radiation; appearing very bright when light shines on it; that can be seen in the dark
data.chText: 指发荧光的、强烈反光的、发亮的：
荧光照明
戴着黄色荧光臂章的自行车手

data.enText: shining in the dark; very bright or too bright
data.chText: 指发夜光的、鲜亮的、耀眼的：
钟的夜光指针
指（颜色）耀眼的、鲜艳的、醒目的：

data.enText: His eyes were a vivid green.
data.chText: 他的眼睛碧绿。
指（颜色）耀眼的、鲜艳的、醒目的：

data.enText: The room was decorated in vibrant blues and greens.
data.chText: 那房间以鲜艳的蓝绿两色装饰。
用vivid还是vibrant？

data.enText: These two words are very similar, but vivid emphasizes how bright a colour is, while vibrant suggests a more lively and exciting colour or combination of colours.
data.chText: 这两个词非常相似，但vivid强调颜色鲜艳明亮，而vibrant则指色彩或颜色组合活泼而富生气的。

word_means: 充满活力的，生气勃勃的
充满生机的，活跃的，精力充沛的

means: 充满活力的，生气勃勃的
充满生机的，活跃的，精力充沛的

tr: of colors that are bright and striking
of sounds that are strong and resonating

example: a vibrant group that challenged the system

example.ex: Tom felt himself being drawn towards her vibrant personality...
example.tran: 汤姆感觉自己被她充满朝气的个性所吸引。

example.ex: Orlando itself is vibrant, full of affordable accommodation and great places to eat.
example.tran: 奥兰多本身充满了朝气，有很多便宜的旅馆和吃饭的好去处。

value.def: Someone or something that is vibrant is full of life, energy, and enthusiasm.
value.tran: 充满生气的;精力充沛的;活跃的

example.ex: She was a woman with extraordinary vibrancy and extraordinary knowledge.
example.tran: 她是一位充满活力、博学多识的女子。

example.ex: Horizon Blue, Corn Yellow and Pistachio Green are just three of the vibrant colours in this range...
example.tran: 天际蓝、玉米黄、淡草绿色只是这一色系内的3种亮色。

example.ex: The grass was a vibrant green.

value.def: Vibrant colours are very bright and clear.

example.ex: ...a selection of vibrantly coloured French cast-iron saucepans.
example.tran: 可供选择的色彩鲜亮的法国铸铁平底锅
